name: Cold Gears: Act 1
description:
A vast world of discovery. You are an agent of the Soviet Union in the Cold War, your mission is to invade the base of Alaska to obtain important information.

It's a visual novel game with a history based on Metal Gear Solid

Story Script: Helder Camargo

Illustration: Nikolas Pereira

Programming: Edward Waltrick & Nikolas Pereira

The images and sounds of third parties used in this game belong respectively to the creators themselves.

Because it is a free product, this game will not be sold.
